text: Good morning! It's a chilly winter morning in Yokosuka with a temp of 2.1°C and partly cloudy skies. Don't miss the New Year Events in Kurihama on January 11th, featuring Dondo-yaki and Otakiage! #Yokosuka #Miura #NewYear

tomorrow.weather_text_ja: くもり　時々　晴れ
